review: Reviewing after a month. This is my first tattoo of my life and I was waiting for this moment. I researched and zeroed in to this place and I wasn’t disappointed at all. Pravin is a professional tattoo artist who suggested this remarkable art on my arm and made it fabulous. He followed up on a weekly basis and suggested how to take care of the tattoo. Highly recommend his work of art
